Name: Disgusting Egg
Effect: reload 1 whenever an enemy is killed.

Name: Knife
Effect: reload 1 whenever a melee attack deals a critical hit.

Name: Pipe
Effect: if you did not use any attack card in your turn, reload 1 at end of turn.

Name: Bronze Ring
Effect: at the start of your turn, reload 1 if your hp is below 50%.

Name: Sea Horse
Effect: 20% to reload 1 when you use a ranged card.

Name: Shovel
Effect: at the end of your turn, if you have no ammo, reload 1.

Name: Refined Ammo
Effect: at max ammo, heal 2 for each extra ammo reloaded. remaining: 50 hp

Name: Fossil
Effect: when you have no ammo, reload to max. can only trigger once per battle.

Name: Jade Talisman
Effect: -1 max ammo. reload to max at the start of your turn.

Name: Honey Ale
Effect: if you are drunk, reload 1 when you deal a critical hit.

Name: Cursed Book
Effect: at the end of your turn, reload to max, lose 5 hp for each ammo reloaded in this way. can't be removed.

Name: Sacred Book
Effect: at the end of your turn, reload 1 if you are not at max ammo. remaining: 25 Ammo.
